channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping again by bins on Amelia Street, 4th January
item.description:

item.title: Flytipped Gas Cannisters, 4th January
item.description:
This location has weekly deposits of these canisters. They are costly to removed and dispose of and they should not be left on our streets.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frant Close, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black ice on highway at junction of New Street Hill and Oak Tree Gardens, 4th January
item.description:
Could New Street Hill itself, and the junction with Oak Tree Gardens in particular, please be gritted due to thick black ice at the junction and the steep road gradient. There are already reports of traffic incidents here. Thank you. Cllr Alisa Igoe
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leamington Avenue, Sundridge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 problems both by bus stop near path to Bluebell Drive re trees, 4th January
item.description:
Christmas tree been dumped by bus stop. Someone has dumped lots of large tree cuttings making the path on Goffs Lane dangerous. Hedge also over the path also needs cutting back as could catch a pedestrian in the eye.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 564, Goff's Lane, Broxbourne
Report on FixMyStreet
